name: UCI Basic Needs Center – FRESH Pantry
location: 800 W Peltason Dr, Irvine, CA 92617 (check source_url for current pantry access/pickup details)
description: Provides emergency food and basic necessities support for UCI students.
target_audience: UCI students (undergraduate and graduate)

name: UCI Basic Needs Center – Mobile Food Pantry
location: Varies by date: Verano, Palo Verde, Arroyo Vista (check source_url for schedule)
description: Mobile pantry distributions that bring food closer to students on scheduled days and locations.
target_audience: Current UCI undergraduate and graduate students

name: UCI Basic Needs Center – CalFresh Application Assistance
location: 800 W Peltason Dr, Irvine, CA 92617 (appointments + support. See source_url for process)
description: Book an appointment with a trained CalFresh advocate for step-by-step help applying; students can also apply on their own and email questions.
target_audience: Current UCI undergraduate and graduate students seeking grocery/EBT support

name: UCI Counseling Center – Crisis Support (24/7)
location: 203 Student Services 1, Irvine, CA 92697-2200 (crisis care available 24/7 by phone)
contact_info: Call (949) 824-6457 (after hours, select option 2 for crisis support)
description: 24/7 crisis support for UCI students experiencing urgent mental health or crisis situations; also provides emergency resource links (911, 988).
target_audience: UCI students (undergraduate and graduate)

name: UCI Counseling Center – Referral & Resource Support (Case Management)
location: 203 Student Services 1, Irvine, CA 92697-2200
contact_info: Call (949) 824-6457 and request a Case Manager for referral/resource support
description: Case management support that helps students connect to appropriate mental health and support resources (including off-campus referrals) and navigate next steps.
target_audience: UCI students (undergraduate and graduate)

name: UCI Student Health Center
location: 501 Student Health, Irvine, CA 92697-5200
description: Medical services and health support for registered UCI students. Hours: Mon/Tue/Thu/Fri 8am–5pm; Wed 9am–5pm; Sat 9am–1pm (seasonal). For emergencies call 911.
target_audience: UCI students (undergraduate and graduate)

name: UCI Disability Services Center (DSC)
location: Continuing Education, 234 Pereira Dr, Irvine, CA 92697
contact_info: Phone: 949-824-7494 | Email: dsc@uci.edu | Fax: 949-824-3410 | Office Hours: Mon–Fri 8:00am–5:00pm
description: Coordinates academic accommodations and disability-related support services for students with documented needs.
target_audience: UCI students (undergraduate and graduate) seeking disability accommodations

name: UCI Division of Career Pathways
location: 100 Student Services 1, Irvine, CA 92697-2075
description: Career services including advising, internship/job support, and career programming.
target_audience: UCI students (undergraduate and graduate)

name: UCI Office of Financial Aid and Scholarships (OFAS) – Undergraduate & Graduate
location: 102 Aldrich Hall, Irvine, CA 92697
description: Financial aid support for undergraduate and graduate students, including questions about aid, loans, and scholarships; includes appointment and phone help options.
target_audience: UCI undergraduate and graduate students (excluding professional programs: Business, Law, Medicine)

name: UCI Merage School of Business – Financial Aid
location: SB1-4301, Paul Merage School of Business, Irvine, CA 92697-3125
description: Financial aid support for Merage School of Business graduate students.
target_audience: UCI Merage School of Business graduate students (MBA and related programs)

name: UCI School of Law – Financial Aid
location: 401 E. Peltason Drive, Suite 1000, Irvine, CA 92697-8000

target_audience: UCI School of Law students (JD program)

name: UCI School of Medicine – Financial Aid
location: 836 Medical Education Building, Irvine, CA 92697-4089
description: Financial aid and educational financing support for School of Medicine students.
target_audience: UCI School of Medicine students (MD program)

name: UCI Writing Center (Center for Excellence in Writing & Communication)
